title: Readout on Meeting with Democratic Congressional Leaders | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




February 02, 2009

 



Readout on Meeting with Democratic Congressional Leaders




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary   For Immediate Release                     February 2, 2009   The President had a productive meeting to discuss the Economic Recovery and Reinvestment plan with Democratic congressional leaders late this afternoon. They agreed on the urgency of passing effective legislation in the short term and committed to continue working together to achieve the bipartisan consensus that the President has sought throughout this process.    THE WHITE HOUSE, February 2, 2009.
